text: Ichon may refer to: * Ichon County, a county in Kangwon province, North Korea ** Ichon Chongnyon Station, the railway station for Ichon, North Korea * Ichon-dong, a dong of Yongsan-gu, Seoul, South Korea ** Ichon Station, a transfer point on the Seoul Metro * Ichon, a barangay in Macrohon, Southern Leyte, Philippines == See also == * Icheon, a city in Gyeonggi province, South Korea
title: Ichon
